targets.query:
from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -3d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r.inverter == "site")
  |> sample(n: 10, pos: 1)

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -3d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r.inverter == "sb71")
  |> sample(n: 10, pos: 1)

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -3d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r.inverter == "sb72")
  |> sample(n: 10, pos: 1)

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -3d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r.inverter == "sb51")
  |> sample(n: 10, pos: 1)

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and (r._field == "power"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.inverter == "site")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  	(r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements")  and
    r._field == "power" and
    (r.inverter == "site") )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _field: "Site",
    _value: 
        if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 
  }))

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  	(r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements")  and
    r._field == "power" and
    (r.inverter == "sb71") )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _field: "SB71",
    _value: 
        if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 
  }))

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  	(r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements")  and
    r._field == "power" and
    (r.inverter == "sb72") )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _field: "SB72",
    _value: 
        if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 
  }))

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  	(r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements")  and
    r._field == "power" and
    (r.inverter == "sb51") )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _field: "SB51",
    _value: 
        if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 
  }))

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "production") and
  						(r.inverter == "site") and
                        ((r._field == "total") or (r._field == "today"))
     		)
  |> last()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v: r._value) / -1000.0,
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> timeShift(duration: 12h, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "today")

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "status") and (r._field == "operating_status") and (r.inverter == "sb71"))
  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "status") and (r._field == "operating_status") and (r.inverter == "sb72"))
  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "status") and (r._field == "operating_status") and (r.inverter == "sb51"))
  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

import "date"
from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -13mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "production") and
  						(r.inverter == "site") and
                        (r._field == "today") and
                        (date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1)
     		)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v: r._value) / -1000.0,
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
//  |> timeShift(duration: 15d, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "past")

import "date"
from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -31d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "production") and
  						(r.inverter == "site") and
                        (r._field == "today")
     		)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v: r._value) / -1000.0,
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> timeShift(duration: 12h, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "past")

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "production") and
  						(r.inverter == "site") and
                        ((r._field == "total") or (r._field == "today"))
     		)
  |> last()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v: r._value) / -1000.0,
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> timeShift(duration: 12h, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "today")

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "status") and (r._field == "condition") and (r.inverter == "sb71"))
  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2/autogen")
  |> range(start: -12h)

  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "status") and (r._field == "derating") and (r.inverter == "sb72"))
  |> sample(n:2, pos: 0)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

  |> range(start: -12h)
